description: Locate extrema in a functional dataset

output_prefix.title: Output Prefix
output_prefix.description: Prefix for an output mask dataset (e.g. -prefix maskNto1)

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: Provides a cutoff value for extrema (e.g. -thresh 17.4)

min_dist.title: Minimum Distance
min_dist.description: Minimum acceptable distance between extrema in voxels (e.g. -min_dist 4)

out_rad.title: Output Radius
out_rad.description: Set the output radius around extrema voxels in voxel units (e.g. -out_rad 9)

spheres_1toN_flag.title: Spheres 1 to N Flag
spheres_1toN_flag.description: Output values will range from 1 to N

spheres_Nto1_flag.title: Spheres N to 1 Flag
spheres_Nto1_flag.description: Output values will range from N to 1

true_max_flag.title: True Max Flag
true_max_flag.description: Extrema may not have equal neighbors

dset_coords_flag.title: Dataset Coordinates Flag
dset_coords_flag.description: Display output in the dataset orientation

no_text_flag.title: No Text Flag
no_text_flag.description: Do not display the extrema points as text

coords_only_flag.title: Coordinates Only Flag
coords_only_flag.description: Only output coordinates (no text or values)

debug_level.title: Debug Level
debug_level.description: Output extra information to the terminal (e.g. -debug 2)
